name: Uncovered (Blanc Christophe, Lucaslgsl, stromineur, Hugo Frl, ishuraden | Jessica Gomes)
name_original: Uncovered (Blanc Christophe, Lucaslgsl, stromineur, Hugo Frl, ishuraden | Jessica Gomes)
description:
You play as a scientist to discover the abyss. With your submarine, you can move and analyze the ecosystem around you to advance science. Uncovered is a cinematic adventure game in 2.5D focused on the exploration and appeal of the unknown.

Team: 
FOREL Hugo - Developpeur
RENAUDIN Célestin - Dev
SAID-ALI Ismaïne - Level Designer / Tech Artist
AÏT OUCHIKH Noam - Concept Artist / Character Designer / Animator
BLANC Christophe - Concept Artist / Character Designer / Animator
GOMES Jessica - Concept Artist / Environnement Artist / UI Designer
LAGRESLE Lucas - Producer
